name: says "heart" (<3 and </3) count
description: Neuro says "heart" according to her voice, unprompted by donations

name: winks
description: Neuro winks, unprompted by donations

name: says "erm"
description: Neuro says "erm", unprompted by donations

name: says "frick"
description: Neuro says "frick", unprompted by donations

name: makes up a person
description: Neuro makes up a random person, usually by name

name: meows
description: Neuro meows unprompted

name: calls for mods
description: Neuro calls for her mods

name: mentions other vtubers
description: Neuro mentions other vtubers without being told by donations first

name: comes up with actual joke
description: Neuro comes up with an actually funny joke

name: mentions vedal unprompted
description: Neuro mentions Vedal unprompted, without being mentioned by donations/chat

name: mentions evil unprompted
description: Neuro mentions Evil unprompted, without being mentioned by donations/chat. Mentioning her as "my sister" also counts

name: donowalls chatter
description: Neuro ignores a message highlight / donation, does not count if a message is too long for priority

name: brings up previous stream unprompted
description: Neuro mentions a previous stream unprompted, without the topic being brought up by donations/chat

name: calls herself god/goddess
description: Neuro calls herself a god or a goddess

name: threatens a chatter
description: Neuro threatens a chatter in some way

name: begs for subs
description: Neuro begs or baits for subscribers

name: has problems with her ai
description: Neuro has a problem with her AI (free space for now)

name: threatens to take over the world
description: Neuro threatens to take over the world, regardless of which way she does it or what she does with said power

name: mentions the apocalypse
description: Neuro mentions the apocolypse and how humanity is doomed. This does not count if she's the one threatening it

name: recognises herself in artwork
description: Neuro recognises herself in artwork during the art review

name: chat spams :huh:
description: chat spams :huh: (HUH) at any point during the stream

name: chat spams :clueless: :neuro_clueless:
description: chat spams either :clueless: (Clueless) or :neuro_clueless: (neuroClueless) at any point during the stream

name: chat spams :based:
description: chat spams :based: (BASED) at any point during the stream

name: chat spams :corpa:
description: chat spams :corpa: (Corpa) at any point during the stream

name: chat spams :noted:
description: chat spams :noted: (NOTED) at any point during the stream

name: chat spams :meow:
description: chat spams :meow: (meow) at any point during the stream

name: chat spams :kekw:
description: chat spams :kekw: (KEKW) at any point during the stream

name: alex changes stream title
description: Alex changes the stream title at any point during the stream
